text: God, a Israelian Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ poroghamiba uari ataghɨrazir arazir kam, bar an aghua. Nɨ uan amuim pazavɨra a damuam, nɨn arazir kam, mati nɨ inim isa gua uaning avarazɨ moghɨn, nɨn aghumsɨzir arazir kuram gua avara, egha mati gua poroghamimning uaning abɨsi. Ia poroghamiba, bar deravɨra uan ikɨrɨmɨrim geghuv, ifavarir arazibar uari damuan markɨ.”2:16 Hibrun akam deragha akar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
